name: Related post widget
author: ibnuyahya

sections.description:
This plugin allow you to display related post in the sidebar. It’s only appear when you open a single post. You can choose whether want to list all post or limit by number of posts.

  • Author: ibnuyahya
  • Author URI: http://www.ibnuyahya.com
  • Copyright: Released under GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE
sections.installation:
Install like any other basic plugin:

  1. Copy the related-post-widget folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder

  2. Activate the Related post widget on your plugin-page.

  3. Drag the Related post widget to your sidebar and change your own setting accordingly

short_description: This widget allow you display related post for single post base on current post category
